Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by you. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $130. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it offers significant savings compared to the original value. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $130. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $130
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
